item.title: Trump says he’s canceled second wave of attacks on Venezuela
item.description: Trump said that at least $100 billion will be invested in Venezuela by U.S. oil giants.

item.title: Trump is desperate to take Greenland. Can NATO defend itself — and is it willing to?
item.description: Trump’s ambition for Greenland raises questions about what happens when two NATO members come to blows.

item.title: Border Patrol agent shoots 2 people in Portland, day after ICE agent kills Minneapolis woman
item.description: Federal officials have accused Renee Nicole Good of trying to run down an ICE agent in Minneapolis when she was shot.

item.title: Trump’s Greenland gambit puts China on edge after Venezuela operation
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's threat to take control of Greenland raised alarms in Beijing as nations vye for the vast mineral reserves in the Arctic ...

item.title: Trump says he's instructing his 'Representatives' to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds, claiming it will lower rates
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is "instructing my Representatives" to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds.
